name: Sweet Home (jay)
description:
Basic tip(s) for players new to parser games: l = look (at room), x = examine (things), i = inventory

Basic tip(s) for "Sweet Home:" Try examining the peephole, turning on the tv, and examining the baby monitor to speak with The House.

Turn on the stereo if you're unsure of where to go after the Living Room. 

Credits: George Saunders & Evan Goldstein.
